archimate:Requirement.name: REQ_BSS_0182
archimate:Requirement.documentation: As a customer I want to be able to forward my call, so that I can use the service if I need

properties.value: No impact on Comarch BSS? Just a characteristic that is passed to OSS for service activation. Assumption: free of charge; current status or enabling/disabling not via Selfcare. Confirmed: free of charge. Status not kept in BSS.

properties.key: Applies to Consumer only, Business only, or Both
